prompts.flat_lay:
Professional e-commerce flat lay photograph of Ron Dorff Corduroy Tennis Shorts in Beige, 97% cotton, 3% spandex.

COMPOSITION: Follow the line drawing guide for garment placement. Maintain natural tennis shorts proportions - athletic/sporty silhouette.

GARMENT DETAILS - MUST BE EXACT:
- EYELETS: Two small BLACK metal eyelets in the lower right area (near the hem). The eyelets are BLACK/dark metal, not silver.
- WAISTBAND: Elastic waistband with drawstring (typically white or matching beige).
- POCKETS: Side seam pockets typical of tennis/athletic shorts.
- Ron Dorff label visible at the waistband.
- TEXTURE: Corduroy fabric with visible wales (ridges) running vertically.

STYLING: Shorts laid perfectly flat. Corduroy texture clearly visible throughout with distinctive ribbed pattern.

COLOR: Match the EXACT beige color from the input image - warm beige tone, consistent and natural.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting with even, diffused illumination. Lighting should highlight the corduroy texture. No harsh shadows.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface. Clean, seamless backdrop.

High-end fashion e-commerce aesthetic. Athletic, sporty tennis shorts silhouette.
prompts.eyelet:
Macro detail shot of the eyelets on Ron Dorff Corduroy Tennis Shorts in Beige, 97% cotton, 3% spandex.

CRITICAL DETAILS:
- Two small BLACK metal eyelets (dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver)
- Eyelets are positioned near the lower right hem area
- Show the corduroy fabric texture surrounding the eyelets
- Vertical corduroy wales (ridges) should be clearly visible

COMPOSITION: Close-up/macro shot. Garment laid flat. Show fabric texture and eyelet detail clearly. The hem/edge of the shorts should be visible.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting. Even illumination to show the black metal finish of the eyelets and corduroy texture.

BACKGROUND: Light gray studio surface.

prompts.fabrics:
Extreme close-up macro shot of the fabric texture on these corduroy tennis shorts.

WHAT TO PHOTOGRAPH:
- The distinctive corduroy texture with vertical wales (ridges)
- Show the raised parallel lines/ridges clearly
- The soft, plush texture of the corduroy pile

COMPOSITION:
- Fill the frame with fabric texture
- Top-down angle, fabric laid completely flat
- Close enough to see the individual wales (vertical ridges)

CRITICAL - COPY FROM INPUT IMAGE:
- Match the EXACT corduroy texture from the input photo
- Same wales size, same ridge density
- This is 97% cotton, 3% spandex with a soft, structured corduroy feel

COLOR: Warm beige tone. Match the exact shade from the input image.

LIGHTING: BRIGHT professional e-commerce studio lighting. Clean, even, well-lit exposure. No dark shadows, no moody lighting. This should look like a bright, clean product photo - NOT dark or underexposed.

BACKGROUND: LIGHT warm gray studio surface - bright and clean, not dark.
